title: US State Tax Calculator
subtitle: Estimate federal and state income tax (sample data).
paragraphs: This tool provides a fast estimate of federal and state income tax using progressive bracket data. The included brackets are sample values â€” replace with official, up-to-date tax tables before using for planning or reporting.
Choose filing status (single / married) and a state to compare take-home pay across jurisdictions.
Tip: For production accuracy, update the TAX_DATA object with current-year federal and state brackets and consider itemized deductions, credits, and local taxes.
